idea: UAVGarage Private Limited is a drone company involved in selling, distributing, manufacturing, servicing, renting, leasing, repair and maintenance, operating, etc. of unmanned or remotely controlled vehicles, more commonly known as drones, robotics, RPAS (Remotely piloted aircraft systems), UAV (unmanned aerial vehicle), UGV (unmanned ground vehicle), etc. The company uses online and offline channels to identify gaps in the said market and services to provide, sell, service and create and distribute solutions. The scope of companies’ business includes components, batteries, controllers, hardware, software, etc. of the said products and services.
name: UAVGARAGE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Pride EduCare is a company based at Mumbai which is committed to increase the employability of youth by providing the best technical skills, knowledge and training.

We have an extensive experience of more than 13 years in education sector. All our teachers are well qualified and experienced in their domain. They go out of their way to train and develop the technical and soft skills of our students. This is precisely the reason, we have trained more than 1,00,000 students who are doing well in their professional lives.

During our interaction, we have realised the challenges faced by the youth especially who come from tier 2 and tier 3 cities. With this virtual classroom course, we are determined to eradicate them.

This is the reason our courses are taught in simple English and Hindi so that students can understand them easily. We are also expanding it to other Indian languages.

Pride EduCare invites you to become our Virtual Partner (VP). You retain your identity and after a small registration process, you can start your classes immediately.
name: PRIDE EDUCARE INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Creation of limited liability partnership for newly start business
name: SCR COMMUNICARE LLP

name: The Leasing Company

idea:
Inkcre Media Private Limited (Inkcre Media) is an Online Gaming Promotion and Digital Marketing company incorporated in January 2021. Startup based out of Thane (Maharashtra), founded by IT industry's veterans with over 10-20 years of experience in Digital Marketing and IT software, infrastructure, consulting Services, etc. Company presently running at validating stage.

We help Gamers with Streaming, YouTube, and Online Content. Our training programs guide gamers to reach their potential audience and build a viable revenue model. As Gaming has become a core aspect of everyday life it can be used as a tool to educate and entertain. It has transformed from a product of leisure to a platform of livelihood. Managing multiple high-growth and renowned digital gaming platforms, we know what gamers want.

One of our objectives is to drive the Gamer’s or would-be gaming professionals to the right track for achieving a viable career.
name: INKCRE MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: OHOO! JAIPUR is an Indian Apparel & Multi Category Based Artisan Brand that revives Traditional Crafts & Clothing with Ethnicity.
name: Ohoo Jaipur
